name: SmartPlatitudes
0:
”Alexa, ask Smart Platitudes for a platitude”
”Alexa, open Smart Platitudes and give me a platitude”
skdetail:

des: The Smart Platitudes skill allows you to start your day off with a selection of humorous platitudes. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
